Name: mal-abdulhameedmada-la
Author: Abdul Hameed Madani And Kunhi Mohammed

Translations.Text: kurravalikal avarute atayalam keant tiriccariyappetum. ennitt (avarute) kutumakalilum padannalilum pitikkappetum
appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
itakunnu kurravalikal nisedhicc tallunnataya narakam
atinnum tilaccupeallunna cutuvellattinumitakk avar currittiriyunnatan‌
appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
tanre raksitavinre sannidhiye bhayappettavann rant svargatteappukalunt‌
appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌

appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
ava rantilum olukikeantirikkunna rantu aruvikalunt‌

appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌

appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌

avar manikyavum pavilavum pealeyayirikkum

appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
